relation: Classes and Widgets that should be moved from others modules up into kdelibs
Add KFadeWidgetEffect to easily add fading UI transitions to KDE applications
Make icon naming spec compliant 3rd party icon themes like Tango or gnome-icon-theme work correctly.
allow backend switching on the fly
update device preference on the fly
Goya, a framework for inserting controls into itemviews in a really easy and fast way
Rich textedit widget supporting most rich text features.
Replace use of profilerc for ordering applications with new mimeapps.list standard
Support caching, and speed up the interface through use of Models/Views and goya
Add CUPS Options tabs to QPrintDialog to support n-up, page borders, banner pages, page labels, mirror pages, job scheduling, and manual CUPS options.
Printing of shortcuts from the shortcut dialog
Sync class and file structure with WebKit to prepare merging
Complete migration of Jalali, Hijri, and Hebrew calendars to new code base.
Models for service browser and domain browser.
support for borders-* properties from the CSS3 Background and Borders Module
support for Audio/Video tags from the HTML5 draft specification
prospective loading of other network resources while waiting for arrival of blocking scripts
Public API for extensions. Possibly analog to JavaScriptCore's C API.
Scripting support for indentation and little helpers
Input modes to allow e.g. vim-like editing
Implement support for inline editing in KFileItemDelegate
Add support for drawing text shadows in KFileItemDelegate
An emoticons library so each applications doesn't have to implement the same things over and over again
Support for About Data of libs and modules used by a program
Drop-in replacement for QFontComboBox, with more informative previews in non-Latin1 locales
Select licenses by keyword, to centralize license info texts for frequent licenses.
KIO::AuthInfo and PasswordDialog: optional fields (like "domain"); optional anonymous switch and flag to suppress KIO's password caching
